item.title: Remote Backup Fail and How to Silently Copy Files
item.description: Recently I’ve run into frustrations withÂ Iron Mountain Connected Backup so I’ve been looking for alternatives. Alternatives: I’ve been running Jungle Disk at home and really like it. I could use that at work except I have not set up an Amazon or RackSpace account with my work credit card. But I am in Chicago and my database server/ file server is in Dallas TX. So I decided to just create a mirror on my laptop onto a shared drive on my server.
